Variables

struct appwidgetinfo * started_apps
 holds the currently started apps
menu_elements * programs
 list of all programs gappman manages. Currently only programs need to be global as only programs have meta-info that can be updated. E.g. resolution updates for a specific program.

Detailed Description

The main application manager better known as gappman.

GPL v2

Authors: Martijn Brekhof <m.brekhof@gmail.com>

Todo:
Be able to popup main menu when other apps have focus. This should probably be solved in the window manager used and not solved by gappman.
Todo:
Unit-testing with http://klee.llvm.org/
Todo:
Implement support for keybindings. For instance to start specific applets.

void update_resolution ( gchar *  programname,
int  width,
int  height 
)

updates the resolution for gappman or any other program

Parameters:
programname string holding the name of the program to update. If NULL the default resolution for gappman is updated
width new width that should be set for the program
height new height that should be set for the program
